description.displayText:
As a Physician and an R.N.,  we  can assure that you will never find a better caregiver in the world than Shanee.  We hired her to help us take care of our 54 year old, terminally ill N.  She is PUNCTUAL and DEPENDABLE.  
     She cared for N with INSTINCTUAL SKILL and fully from the heart. She is gentle, caring, able to encourage/enable N to eat, laugh, enjoy the outdoors on good days and uphold her physically, emotionally, and every way on the tough days. She escorted N to medical appointments and was a DIGNIFIED YET FIRM ADVOCATE for her.  She was a wonderful, attentive, caregiver for Louie the cat, too. Communication  was effortless and crystal clear.   If she didn't know something, she would find out,  and/or promptly ask us what to do.  Patience with everyone.  Clear-headed in stressful situations. She is an angel. Please treat her that way.  We will give Shanee permission to give out our contact information for verification.
description.originalText:
As a Physician and an R.N.,  we  can assure that you will never find a better caregiver in the world than Shanee.  We hired her to help us take care of our 54 year old, terminally ill N.  She is PUNCTUAL and DEPENDABLE.  
     She cared for N with INSTINCTUAL SKILL and fully from the heart. She is gentle, caring, able to encourage/enable N to eat, laugh, enjoy the outdoors on good days and uphold her physically, emotionally, and every way on the tough days. She escorted N to medical appointments and was a DIGNIFIED YET FIRM ADVOCATE for her.  She was a wonderful, attentive, caregiver for Louie the cat, too. Communication  was effortless and crystal clear.   If she didn't know something, she would find out,  and/or promptly ask us what to do.  Patience with everyone.  Clear-headed in stressful situations. She is an angel. Please treat her that way.  We will give Shanee permission to give out our contact information for verification.
